# WARNING: DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE - IT WILL BE OVERWRITTEN WHEN UPGRADING!
arm_64bit=1
kernel=kernel.img

dtoverlay=vc4-kms-v3d,nohdmi
dtoverlay=vc4-kms-dpi-generic,hactive=640,hfp=41,hsync=40,hbp=41
dtparam=vactive=480,vfp=18,vsync=9,vbp=18,rgb666-padhi
dtparam=clock-frequency=24000000
extra_transpose_buffer=2
disable_fw_kms_setup=1
max_framebuffers=2

avoid_warnings=2
disable_overscan=1
boot_delay=0

gpio=0-25=a2

dtoverlay=dwc2
# ,dr_mode=host
